dict.string: D2D Advancer needs location access to show your current position on the map and help you navigate to leads.
D2D Advancer needs location access to show your current position on the map and help you navigate to leads.
D2D Advancer would like access to your Calendar to save scheduled appointments and reminders.
D2D Advancer would like to save your leads to your Contacts app for easy access and to help you stay organized with your door-to-door sales.
